meanings.definition: Consisting of the same element or elements.
meanings.sent1: The homonuclear molecules shared identical atoms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the homonuclear compounds in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The homonuclear mixture looked like a rainbow of elements.
meanings.sent4: Her homonuclear jewelry collection sparkled with unity.
meanings.sent5: The homonuclear structure was as clear as a mirror reflecting itself.

meanings.sent1: The homonuclear isotopes had matching nuclei.
meanings.sent2: The experiment focused on homonuclear interactions.
meanings.sent3: The homonuclear nucleus party was a hit among atoms.
meanings.sent4: Their homonuclear bond was unbreakable like a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The homonuclear connection was like a bridge between atoms.
